name: Technobabylon

files.installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Technobabylon/Technobabylon.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
